subtitle: An Eastern Indian recipe that's finger lickin' good!

method.text: Heat the ghee in a large frying pan or wok. Stir fry the garlic for 1 min. Add the ginger. Fry for 1 min.
Add the onoin. Stir fry for 2-3 min.
Mix the curry paste, tomato puree and enough water to prevent the mixture from sticking. Simmer for 5 min.

Add the desiccated coconut and chopped coriander, and a little extra water if necessary, to give a fairly thick sauce. Add the whole prawns. Cook for 3-4 min, turning occasionally until they turn pink and are cooked through. Don't overcook the prawns or they will become rubbery.

title: Bangladesh prawns
